name: strangers at night
description:
Taking a bike ride at night through the city, you encounter strangers and strike up conversations. 🌃

.:☆*:･' Best played with headphones and in Google Chrome  .:☆*:･'

Inspired by melancholic city nights of Wong Kar Wai movies and Tamagotchi characters, "Strangers at night" is a short game that was made within a week as part of the "social distancing" game jam. 

Thank you and enjoy! 💫

Where else to find me: 
Instagram: @xmai.h
